Content:
# IKEA 3D Model Downloader This Tampermonkey script adds a download button for 3D models on IKEA product pages, allowing you to easily save .GLB files of IKEA furniture and decorations. It works across different language versions of IKEA websites and automatically names the downloaded files based on the product name and color. The files can be opened in 3D software like Blender. This allows you to try out the furniture in your own 3D home planning software before making a purchase decision. UPDATE: 28.11.2025 - Works on latest IKEA website

## Features - Adds a "Download 3D" button next to the "View in 3D" button on IKEA product pages - Works on all language versions of IKEA websites - Automatically names downloaded files using the product name and color ## Installation 1. Install the [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/) browser extension for your browser. 2. Click [this link](https://github.com/apinanaivot/IKEA-3D-Model-Download-Button/raw/refs/heads/main/ikea-3d-model-downloader.user.js) to install or update this script, or alternatively create a new script in Tampermonkey and paste the contents of `ikea-3d-model-downloader.user.js` into it. 3. Save the script and ensure it's enabled in Tampermonkey. ## Usage 1. Navigate to any IKEA product page that has a "View in 3D" button. 2. You'll see a new "Download 3D" button next to the "View in 3D" button. 3. Click the "Download 3D" button to download the GLB file of the 3D model. 4. The file will be saved with a name in the format: `[Product Name] - [Color].glb` ## Troubleshooting - If the download button doesn't appear, ensure you're on a product page with a 3D model available and refresh the page. - If using Chrome, try turning on developer mode - If nothing works, create a [bug report here](https://github.com/apinanaivot/IKEA-3D-Model-Download-Button/issues) and I'll try to fix it as soon as possible ## Disclaimer This tool is designed for personal home planning and visualization. Always respect IKEA's terms of service and use the saved models only for personal home design projects. The authors are not responsible for any misuse or violation of terms. ##
Translation:
# IKEA 3D 模型下载器 这个 Tampermonkey 脚本在 IKEA 产品页面添加了一个下载按钮，允许您轻松保存 IKEA 家具和装饰的 .GLB 文件。它适用于不同语言版本的 IKEA 网站，并自动根据产品名称和颜色命名下载的文件。文件可以在 Blender 等 3D 软件中打开。这样您可以在购买前，先在自己的 3D 家居规划软件中试用家具。 更新：2025 年 11 月 28 日 - 适用于最新的 IKEA 网站

## 功能 - 在 IKEA 产品页面的“3D 查看”按钮旁添加“下载 3D”按钮 - 适用于所有语言版本的 IKEA 网站 - 自动使用产品名称和颜色命名下载的文件 ## 安装 1. 为您的浏览器安装 [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/) 扩展。 2. 点击[此链接](https://github.com/apinanaivot/IKEA-3D-Model-Download-Button/raw/refs/heads/main/ikea-3d-model-downloader.user.js)安装或更新此脚本，或者在 Tampermonkey 中创建新脚本并粘贴 `ikea-3d-model-downloader.user.js` 的内容。 3. 保存脚本并确保在 Tampermonkey 中启用它。 ## 使用方法 1. 进入任何带有“3D 查看”按钮的 IKEA 产品页面。 2. 在“3D 查看”按钮旁会出现一个新的“下载 3D”按钮。 3. 点击“下载 3D”按钮即可下载 3D 模型的 GLB 文件。 4. 文件将以格式 `[产品名称] - [颜色].glb` 保存在本地。 ## 故障排除 - 如果下载按钮未出现，请确认您在带有 3D 模型的产品页面，并刷新页面。 - 如果使用 Chrome，尝试开启开发者模式。 - 如果仍无法解决，欢迎在[此处提交问题](https://github.com/apinanaivot/IKEA-3D-Model-Download-Button/issues)，我会尽快修复。 ## 免责声明 本工具旨在用于个人家居规划和可视化。请始终遵守 IKEA 的服务条款，且仅将保存的模型用于个人家居设计项目。作者不对任何滥用或违反条款行为负责。 ##

RowTranslations.originContent: # IKEA 3D Model Downloader
RowTranslations.translatedContent: # IKEA 3D 模型下载器

RowTranslations.originContent: This Tampermonkey script adds a download button for 3D models on IKEA product pages, allowing you to easily save .GLB files of IKEA furniture and decorations. It works across different language versions of IKEA websites and automatically names the downloaded files based on the product name and color. The files can be opened in 3D software like Blender. This allows you to try out the furniture in your own 3D home planning software before making a purchase decision.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 这个 Tampermonkey 脚本在 IKEA 产品页面添加了一个下载按钮，允许您轻松保存 IKEA 家具和装饰的 .GLB 文件。它适用于不同语言版本的 IKEA 网站，并自动根据产品名称和颜色命名下载的文件。文件可以在 Blender 等 3D 软件中打开。这样您可以在购买前，先在自己的 3D 家居规划软件中试用家具。

RowTranslations.originContent: UPDATE: 28.11.2025 - Works on latest IKEA website
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 更新：2025 年 11 月 28 日 - 适用于最新的 IKEA 网站

RowTranslations.originContent: ## Features
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## 功能

RowTranslations.originContent: - Adds a "Download 3D" button next to the "View in 3D" button on IKEA product pages
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 在 IKEA 产品页面的“3D 查看”按钮旁添加“下载 3D”按钮

RowTranslations.originContent: - Works on all language versions of IKEA websites
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 适用于所有语言版本的 IKEA 网站

RowTranslations.originContent: - Automatically names downloaded files using the product name and color
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 自动使用产品名称和颜色命名下载的文件

RowTranslations.originContent: ## Installation
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## 安装

RowTranslations.originContent: 1. Install the [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/) browser extension for your browser.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 1. 为您的浏览器安装 [Tampermonkey](https://www.tampermonkey.net/) 扩展。

RowTranslations.originContent: 2. Click [this link](https://github.com/apinanaivot/IKEA-3D-Model-Download-Button/raw/refs/heads/main/ikea-3d-model-downloader.user.js) to install or update this script, or alternatively create a new script in Tampermonkey and paste the contents of `ikea-3d-model-downloader.user.js` into it.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 2. 点击[此链接](https://github.com/apinanaivot/IKEA-3D-Model-Download-Button/raw/refs/heads/main/ikea-3d-model-downloader.user.js)安装或更新此脚本，或者在 Tampermonkey 中创建新脚本并粘贴 `ikea-3d-model-downloader.user.js` 的内容。

RowTranslations.originContent: 3. Save the script and ensure it's enabled in Tampermonkey.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 3. 保存脚本并确保在 Tampermonkey 中启用它。

RowTranslations.originContent: ## Usage
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## 使用方法

RowTranslations.originContent: 1. Navigate to any IKEA product page that has a "View in 3D" button.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 1. 进入任何带有“3D 查看”按钮的 IKEA 产品页面。

RowTranslations.originContent: 2. You'll see a new "Download 3D" button next to the "View in 3D" button.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 2. 在“3D 查看”按钮旁会出现一个新的“下载 3D”按钮。

RowTranslations.originContent: 3. Click the "Download 3D" button to download the GLB file of the 3D model.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 3. 点击“下载 3D”按钮即可下载 3D 模型的 GLB 文件。

RowTranslations.originContent: 4. The file will be saved with a name in the format: `[Product Name] - [Color].glb`
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 4. 文件将以格式 `[产品名称] - [颜色].glb` 保存在本地。

RowTranslations.originContent: ## Troubleshooting
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## 故障排除

RowTranslations.originContent: - If the download button doesn't appear, ensure you're on a product page with a 3D model available and refresh the page.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 如果下载按钮未出现，请确认您在带有 3D 模型的产品页面，并刷新页面。

RowTranslations.originContent: - If using Chrome, try turning on developer mode
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 如果使用 Chrome，尝试开启开发者模式。

RowTranslations.originContent: - If nothing works, create a [bug report here](https://github.com/apinanaivot/IKEA-3D-Model-Download-Button/issues) and I'll try to fix it as soon as possible
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 如果仍无法解决，欢迎在[此处提交问题](https://github.com/apinanaivot/IKEA-3D-Model-Download-Button/issues)，我会尽快修复。

RowTranslations.originContent: ## Disclaimer
RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## 免责声明

RowTranslations.originContent: This tool is designed for personal home planning and visualization. Always respect IKEA's terms of service and use the saved models only for personal home design projects. The authors are not responsible for any misuse or violation of terms.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: 本工具旨在用于个人家居规划和可视化。请始终遵守 IKEA 的服务条款，且仅将保存的模型用于个人家居设计项目。作者不对任何滥用或违反条款行为负责。
